title: oc 5.0.9 dropbox updates not visible
body:
i am running oc 5.0.9 in a redhat openshift hosted application. i have enabled external storage and connected to my dropbox account using a developer key and secret and full access.

the problem is that files uploaded to a subfolder in dropbox using the dropbox web interface do not show up in the oc web interface, no matter how many times i refresh the page or how long i wait. if i upload the same file to the root dropbox folder, oc immediately sees it. it seems like dropbox change detection is broken for subdirectories.

steps to reproduce:
1. browse to dropbox account.
2. click on folder "org".
3. drag and drop "example.txt" file into browser.
4. open oc in browser.
5. click on dropbox external storage folder.
6. click on folder "org".
7. observe that example.txt is not listed.

output of uname -a:
linux ex-std-node139.prod.rhcloud.com 2.6.32-358.6.2.el6.x86_64 #1 smp tue may 14 15:48:21 edt 2013 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 gnu/linux

web server:
apache/2.2.15 (unix)

database:
/usr/bin/mysql ver 14.14 distrib 5.1.69, for redhat-linux-gnu (x86_64) using readline 5.1

php --version
php 5.3.3 (cli) (built: jul 12 2013 04:36:18) 

no information is recorded in owncloud.log when adding a file using the dropbox web interface, either to the root directory or subdirectory.
